metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10271 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
tools/tiffcrop.c in LibTIFF 4.0.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (heap-based buffer over-read and buffer overflow) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact via a crafted TIFF image, related to "READ ofsize 1" and libtiff/tif_fax3.c:413:13.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10271` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
